title: Microlending Partnership Models
description: While DLT can increase the value created from the microlending ecosystem, Cardano's partnership model is currently undefined.

f6_assessments.q0: I think the proposal addresses a great challenge and one that requires more informatuon regarding which particular key players are required or will be connected to achieve the solution. In practice the proposer addresses the 'what needs to be done' but which amount microlenders are available and open for such plan to take shape.
f6_assessments.q1: I think the experience shkwn is quite great and relevant to the task. I believe this can be achieved by the proposer as shown on its detailed roadmap and strategy.
f6_assessments.q2: More information is required as to the metrics used to avhieve the solution to this challenge. The process is sound and the strategy is robust but more data on which microlenders are available/open to such approach and what are the infrastructure needed to be in place already to build it on Cardano.

solution: Collaborate with leading microlenders to identify partnerships opportunities and define foundational strategic and technical approaches.
experience:
Jon Saginaw: 20+ years experience in Technology Consulting with well-known companies.

WADA Skilled team of practitioners and entrepreneurs
